# Change For SRCL

The following changes are made for easier data processing in Matlab.

filesink.cpp

* FileSink::~FileSink: changed "\ng3log g3FileSink shutdown at: " to "\n\ng3log g3FileSink shutdown at: "

filesinkhelper.ipp

* std::string header(): removed "\t\t" before ""g3log created log at ..."
* std::string header(): commented out log format instruction

logmessage.cpp

* std::string LogMessage::toString() const: changed return normalToString(*this); to return normalToStringMinimal(*this);
* added function: std::string normalToStringMinimal(const LogMessage& msg){}

custom_loglevels.hpp

* added DATA level: const LEVELS DATA {INFO.value + 1, {"DATA"}};
* added header "custom_loglevels.hpp" to "g3log/g3log.hpp"
